resources.string: Dance Dance Revolution (DDR) is a rhythm game that uses four panels.
The newest DDR version, Dance Dance Revolution A3, can be played in the United States.
The hardest difficulty in DDR is 20.
Justin Bieber has been featured in an official DDR game.
Taylor Swift has been featured in an official DDR game.
Dance Dance Revolution Mario Mix is an official DDR game.
The score requirement for the "AA" grade in DDR A3 is 950,000 points.
The most accurate judgment (as of DDR A3) that can be earned is called "Perfect!!"
In Europe, DDR was originally called "Dancing Stage."
Hitting all the arrows in a song without missing once is called a "Full Combo."
Do you really want to cheat?
